name: Sniper Hunt-er 3D: Wild Animal
description:
Wild Sniper Hunter 3D is the latest realistic sniper shooter hunting game on the marketplace!

You become a skilled sniper tasked with hunting woodland animals. Complete each hunting mission with the M24 SWS sniper rifle to shoot each mission required prey, like deer, boar, eagles, mountain lions, wolves, and bears.

Make sure you know which animal you're hunting, shooting the incorrect animal whilst out on the hunt or run out of bullets will fail the mission, so know your target and watch your ammo. Watch each bullet fired hit the animal target from your sniper in amazing dynamic bullet cam!

The massive woodland environment is your hunting ground, wild animals roam unaware of the skilled sniper shot you're about to perform. Professional sniping huntsmen mission take you to all new areas of the hug forest wilderness, test your shooting skills, get ready for the most skilled sniper shoot game yet, our most realistic hunting game to date, Wild Sniper Hunter 3D!
